name: Survex 3D Cavern File
summary: The electronic representation of a three-dimensional object is known as a 3D file. A 3D file format is used to store information about 3D models. It usually stores information about 3D models as plain text or binary data. The internal file format of these files describe the structure of these files that can be used by application developers.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: 3D files are viewed with Aven, a visualization program bundled with the Survex software package.

description: 3D file created by Survex, a program used for recording and visualizing cave system data; contains data that allows the software to visualize a 3D cave system; was generated from an .SVX file using the cavern program included with Survex.

instructions: Check the Open Source APIs to read and write 3D files.
